text: I have been currently working as a delivery driver for hungry Howie's for about five days and I enjoy the work place environment. me and my wife eat here regularly and I've never had a complaint with the service or the food and I love pizza all flavors I must say they can put together a great combination pizza. Love Hungry Howie's pizza.

name: Gurwinder Singh
text: Very tasty.   I love you that pizza sauce.  Nobody meats the wings.  Baked not fried.  Love them .  I keep going back for more wings

name: Anthony Montgomery
text: I have a promo code: "VIP FREE LARGE WITH ANY MENU PRICE HOWIE BREAD PURCHASE." It reads "USE ONLINE ONLY." When I tried to use the code online, it was ringing up as $6.99 for the bread and $11.79 for the pizza. I did not add anything other â€¦More

text: Won't answer the phone, app won't accept payments, had to call another place instead.

name: Michael B.
text: Always good salad

name: Sarah Tanner
text: Very friendly service!

name: Lee Swindle
text: The employees were very friendly and I had no issues at all. Fast service and good food at a reasonable price.

name: Daina Peugh
text: Awesome pizza quick and on time...

name: Marsha Hayes
text: Never been dissatisfied. Always what I order at its best. Fresh and HotðŸ”¥ Quick service and polite employees

name: Elizabeth Smith
text: The last two times we have ordered from here has been an absolute nightmare. The last time (about a month ago) we had to wait almost 20 minutes after the online tracker said our order was ready because they screwed up our order, and tonight â€¦More

name: marian Chris Reese
text: The pizza is consistently good. Its the best "cheap" pizza you can get. I prefer it over little ceasars and most other chains. We ordered ours on friday night and even though online it said our order would be ready in 20 min it took about â€¦More

name: Juliann Winfree
text: We received our food hot, fast, and the correct order.

name: Wanda Church
text: Said online my food would arrive in 40 minutes. An hour and 15 minutes later the girl that delivered my food put it on the ground and was going to leave it there, I did the no contact delivery but I have 2 chairs on my front porch.  Why put my food on the ground? Nasty..

name: Tracy Barrett
text: I stayed on the phone waiting to speak to someone for 48 minutes before I got mad and hung up. My son ordered ours off of the delivery app and it wasn't good, it was cold,  we asked for no mushroom but both sandwiches had mushrooms. Not no good service at all!!!!

name: Bryce Besherse
text: Don't take card, only cash and they're really rude about it.

name: Tahnya Bell
text: Not consistent. Ordered pizza with two toppings; pepperoni and banana peppers. I had a couple of slices that did not have ANY peppers on them. The other slices had one to two pieces of peppers per slice. Definitely should not have counted â€¦More

name: adthomas04
text: I was charged $8 + $1.49 for a medium pepperoni pizza. The special they ran for a large 3 topping cost less. then the pizza was slopp . Will never go back.

name: Carla Don
text: I'm usually okay with their food & service. However the last time I ordered delivery (just yesterday)...my Greek salad was not fresh & full of aged lettuce! I had to toss half of it & could barely eat it. Very disappointing. And I was craving a fresh salad!!!

name: Qway ysl
text: Great pizza

name: Susan Ellis
text: I love their cheesy bread. I am not crazy about their pizza crust, but my kids really enjoy it and they are very affordable. The cookie is awesome too!

name: weston roberts
text: Best quick pizza around. Food is always savory. You will not be a hungry Howie after you eat this.

name: Mo Howard
text: No stars Christy her attitude was like I don't care I am working. Keep scratching head pulling phone out a customer got his order before mines. I had get refund my daughter and self really wanted pizza.

name: Rusty Andrews
text: I now know it's not necessarily that they're incompetent, it's from the general manager's on down that they couldn't care less about your order, nor your business. â€¦More

text: I've been ordering for delivery since the  end of last year, and having a large family, I always order the 3 medium pizzas for $5.55. I actually order 6. I called today to place my normal order and was told they don't deliver the specials. â€¦More

name: Cannibal Jones
text: Prices aren't as good as they use to be and half the time not enough on the flavoured crust but still my favorite pizza place in Tuscaloosa.

name: Quade Carter
text: I'm visiting my sister this weekend and called in for delivery. I didn't know the street address to her house and didn't want to bother her to ask. My friend and I called to see if they delivered here hours prior and they said they did. She â€¦More

text: Not very good! Cheese steak hot sub had no taste. Was very disappointing

name: David Crombie
text: I don't know what these idiots order to make them think this This pizza is awful but to me this is the best pizza here in town! When you order extras on the pizza now that's when the prices get out rageous I need to talk about that â€¦More

name: Katie Colbert
text: Overpriced and the staff had no idea what was going on. She couldn't keep the order straight at all, so no surprise that we got the wrong topping.

name: Miranda Byrd
text: Not the best Hungry Howie's I've had. When I first moved here, it was our staple "cheap, get it & go" dinner but after several "so-so" experiences we've moved on. I know HH has great crust because I've had it before but here it always seems burnt and leaves a funky taste in my mouth.
